thread.section_title: Chrissy Teigen News, Instagram and Baby Luna Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Drunk shares hilarious Grammys Snapchat
thread.title_full: Drunk Chrissy Teigen shares hilarious Grammys Snapchat | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Davison for MailOnline
title: Drunk shares hilarious Grammys Snapchat

organizations.name: woody shaw michael spiro/wayne wallace la orquesta sinfonietta

text:
She looked incredible when she headed to a Grammys after party at the Chateau Marmont with her husband John Legend on Sunday night.
But 31-year-old Chrissy Teigen appeared to have had a few too many if her hilarious drunken Snapchat video is anything to go by.
The model could be seen falling to the floor while still in her finery, after announcing that she was having some ramen, saying: 'I'm on the floor. And John is in charge of taking my jewellery off. Take it off.'
Scroll down for video
'Are you mad coz I got drunk?': Worse for wear Chrissy Teigen shared hilarious Snapchat as she fell to the floor in front of husband John Legend following wild night out at Grammys
Double trouble: The model could be seen falling to the floor while still in her finery, saying: 'I'm on the floor. And John is in charge of taking my jewellery off. Take it off'
However, it was not a seamless situation as she could be heard screaming out in pain as John got the jewellery tangled in her hair.
'Oh this is just one that's wrapped up in itself,' he said as he tried to untangle it all.
In the next scene, Chrissy can be seen sitting on her sofa as she questions whether or not she has pushed her husband too far.
'Are you mad at me?' she asked him.
Painful process: However, it was not a seamless situation as she could be heard screaming out in pain as John got the jewellery tangled in her hair
'Are you mad at me?' she asked him as they cosied up to one another
Hilarious: 'Why would I be mad at you, you're perfect?' her doting love replied. 'I dunno,' she continued. 'Coz I got drunk?'
'Why would I be mad at you, you're perfect?' her doting love replied.
'I dunno,' she continued. 'Coz I got drunk?'
Chrissy put on quite the show with husband John Legend at the 59th Grammy Awards inside the Staples Center, Los Angeles, earlier that night.
And Chrissy turned heads again at an after party thrown by GQ and Chance The Rapper at the after party in her stunning second gown.
Highlighting her phenomenal figure, the stunner dazzled in a burnt orange gown that proved to be equally as chic as her awards dress.
Earlier on: Chrissy turned heads at a Grammys after party thrown by GQ and Chance The Rapper at Chateau Marmont as she cosied up to husband John
Feeling fine: Chrissy appeared to be showing no sign of her wild night out
Shady lady: The star hid behind a large pair of shades, looking effortlessly stylish
Featuring a plunging neckline, the gown flashed a hint of her cleavage and cinched in at her tiny waist with a thick beige belt.
The dazzling dress also bore a thigh high split that offered a look at her lean legs, whilst she added some extra height to her frame with a pair of perspex heels.
Keeping her hairstyle relatively similar, her chestnut tresses were styled in loose wet look waves, but she pulled her locks from behind her ear to frame her pretty face.
Cute couple: Earlier in the evening the couple had looked just as stunning as they hit the Grammys red carpet in different but equally as chic ensembles
Earlier in the evening, the loved-up couple passionately danced down the red carpet much to the delight of fans and the media.
Known for her exuberant personality, Chrissy didn't hold back as she draped her arms around John's neck and closed her eyes.
As she raised her arms into the air, John placed his hands on her hips and pursed his lips in appreciation.
Orange you glad to see her: Highlighting her phenomenal figure, the 31-year-old model dazzled in a burnt orange gown that proved to be equally as chic as her awards dress
Look wonderful in a Paule Ka wrap dress like Chrissy Paule Ka gown
Shop Paule Ka here!
Buy now
Chrissy Teigen always looks great, but her outfit for the GQ Grammy Awards after party has got to be one of our favourites of her recent outfits.
The custom dress by Paule Ka was in a trendy burnt orange shade, which complemented her colouring beautifully.
Cinching in her waist with a nude belt, the model managed to subtly emphasise her killer curves.
A satin dress always looks luxurious, but this one, with the draped plunge neck, has an extra-glamorous feel.
Unfortunately Chrissy’s exact dress is unavailable to buy, but click right for more by the designer. Look carefully and you’ll be able to find a few pieces in this same shade!
Alternatively, why not shop our edit below for some options which are all very similar to Chrissy’s.
Gold jewellery would work best with this dress. Take inspiration from Chrissy and stock up with lots of over-the-top bling to complete this fashion-forward look.

Chest a glimpse: Featuring a plunging neckline, the gown flashed a hint of Chrissy's cleavage as cuddled up to her husband John, music producer Quincy Jones and GQ editor Jim Nelson
The fun-loving pair couldn't help but smile as they put on the romantic display which also saw Chrissy show off her curves in a stunning cut out gown.
Chrissy's edgy gown featured an array of textures and styles - the black see-through lace hinted at the cover girl's fit frame, while black crochet detailing cinched in her waist and gave a body-con effect.
The neckline was strapped together with black string to create a trendy choker look and was further embellished with green-tinted feathers.
The long-sleeved number also included fringe on the hem and tail of the dress.
Fabulous: Katy Perry was also in attendance as she slipped into a black dress with a thigh high split and a mongolian fur style cape
Hosts with the most: Youtube Head of Global Music Lyor Cohen and Chance The Rapper were behind the party and seemed in great spirits on the night
Cosy: Rapper Big Sean (L) and Jhene Aiko cuddled up to each other as they posed for snaps
Dripping in jewels: Singer Ray J and wife Princess Love were sartorially in sync with their selection of gold chains as they cosied up to each other on the outing
Bit of all white! Princess Love dazzled in her plunging cream gown which hugged her frame
Cute couple: The pair held each other's hands as they strolled into the party
All smiles: The couple giggled away as they headed into the venue
Gal pals: Model Kara Del Toro (L) was joined by an equally gorgeous friend as they attended the bash in their flesh flashing ensembles
Tatt's a good look: Singer Ty Dolla Sign flashed his neck tattoo in a T-shirt and black coat
Feeling fly: Rapper Offset of Migos seemed to be full of confidence on the outing
Snap happy: Don Cheadle (R) and Bridgid Coulter looked in great spirits as they posed
Flashing flesh: Charlie XCX had donned a Moschino dress with a lingerie print across the chest
Bold look: At first glance the singer appeared to be wearing just her lingerie on the night
Blue-tiful: Bella Thorne's navy tresses complemented the all pink ensemble she donned
You've cat to be kitten me! Despite choosing not to wear a gown on the night, the 19-year-old actress ensured she would still turn heads by donning an all-pink ensemble
Chest a glimpse! Bella donned a skimpy pink vest which she opted to go braless beneath, whilst she layered up with rose coloured leather jacket
Three's company: Christina Milian and Teyana Taylor cuddled up to eachother as they joined Karrueche Tran to pose for snaps together
Busting out: The ladies' dazzled as they snapped pictures whilst some guests jumped in
Two's company: Christina Milian arrived on the arm of Karrueche
Firm friends: The gal pals were in great spirits on the night as they cosied up to each other
Looking dazzling: Karrueche flaunted her lean legs in a thigh skimming silver mini skirt
Taking the plunge: The model also donned a plunging black crop top on the night
Radiant in red: Karrueche dazzled in a scarlet strapless gown that skimmed her ankles
Lovely ladies: Chance the Rapper was surrounded by glamorous gal pals on the night
Loving life: The rapper beamed as he posed for pictures with his friends
Lacy lady: Alexandra Daddario dazzled in a black dress with a sheer lace overlay that flattered her phenomenal figure whilst remaining demure
All smiles: Rapper G Eazy looked like he was enjoying himself on the night
Braidy bunch: Lil Yachty accessoried with some clear beads on his red braids which complemented his colourful grills
Chirpy: Howard Mittman couldn't keep the smile off his face on the night
All smiles: Chance the Rapper and DJ Oreo seemed to be enjoying themselves on the night
Famous friends: Chance the Rapper had mingled with Rihanna earlier in the evening
Winning! He had accepted the award for Best New Artist at the Grammys that night
Twice as nice: As an extra treat Chance received his award from Jennifer Lopez
All smiles: He looked in great spirits as he had the award handed over to him
Teigen paired the intricate dress with simple black barely-there heeled sandals and a gold metallic clutch with red accents.
The Sports Illustrated model's makeup matched the ensemble perfectly and consisted of a dark smokey eye with a sharp black liner emphasizing Chrissy's honey eyes and a nude-peach glossy lip.
Her balayage hair was styled by celebrity stylist Jen Atkin, who cut her brunette tresses to shoulder length and styled them in a wet-look beach wave fashion with a deep side part.
Dirty dancing! Chrissy Teigen, 31, and John Legend, 38, made a showstopping entrance at the 59th Grammy Awards inside the Staples Center, Los Angeles, on Sunday night
Hold me: The loved-up couple passionately danced down the red carpet much to the delight of fans and the media
Fun couple: John checked out his gorgeous wife as she sashayed around for him
Going for it: Known for her exuberant personality, Chrissy didn't hold back as she draped her arms around John's neck and closed her eyes
Meanwhile, her husband and father of her nearly one-year-old daughter Luna was dashing in a black two-piece shirt and a salmon button-down with a matching tie.
Despite the sexy number draped over the beauty's enviable curves and her cool new haircut, fans seemed more concerned about whether she had got the green tint off her fingers from the previous day's Fun Dip incident.
Chrissy and John stopped to talk to E! on the red carpet, where Chrissy explained: 'I had a Fun Dip incident and I ate them with my fingers,' she explained, 'I know you're supposed to use the stick, but I used the stick as an appetizer.'
Stunning: The Sports Illustrated model's makeup consisted of a dark smokey eye with a sharp black liner emphasizing Chrissy's honey eyes and a nude-peach glossy lip
Cleaning up well: Chrissy looked stunning in a black strappy gown
Edgy: Chrissy's gown featured an array of textures and styles - including the black see-through lace and black crochet detailing
To which John reacted by laughing, saying: 'She uh...eats like a toddler.'
Chrissy's beauty fiasco led to her trending on Twitter during the Grammys, with users wanting to know the outcome of the accident.
One Quote: : 'I have zero interest in watching the #grammys2017 & don't know most of these artists. Just watching to see @chrissyteigen green hand.'
Beauty fiasco: Chrissy and John stopped to talk to E! on the red carpet, where Chrissy explained the aforementioned incident
Veteran: Legend is not nominated at this year's ceremony, however, the 10-time Grammy winner is set to perform onstage with Cynthia Erivo
Another commented: 'Hey @Chrissyteigen, how did you deshrek yourself? #FunDipProblems'
Chrissy, notorious for live-tweeting Hollywood award shows, took to Twitter to react: 'No one will stop asking about my green fingers.'
Before heading into the ceremony, Legend and Teigen enjoyed a private dance party - effectively steaming up the red carpet.
Couple goals: The parents-of-one looked very much in love as they took in the award ceremony
'I am melting!' Chrissy excitedly tweeted about the moment she got to chat with her 'goddess' Jennifer Lopez
Legend is not nominated at this year's ceremony, however, the 10-time Grammy winner is set to perform onstage with Cynthia Erivo.
The duo will perform the classic beach boys song God Only Knows.
